item.title: Liberty, Control, and the Business of "Free"
item.author: mikeyparker@gmail.com (Mike Parker)
item.description: We’ve traded our privacy for “free” web services—but at what cost? Corporations and governments harvest our data, turning users into products in a vast surveillance economy. We’ve handed over control of our digital lives. What began as convenience has become corporate and state overreach. This isn’t just about privacy—it’s a battle between liberty and control. Wake up before it’s too late.
